result.name: survey-data
result.notes: Data collected to inform the design and environmental mitigation

organization.name: high-speed-2
organization.title: High Speed 2 Limited
organization.description:
High Speed Two Limited (HS2 Ltd) is responsible for developing proposals for a new national high speed rail network. It is a company limited by guarantee and wholly funded by grant-in-aid from the government.

HS2 is an executive non-departmental public body of the Department for Transport

http://www.hs2.org.uk/

result.title: Survey Data

extras.value: Data currently held by a variety of third parties but being drawn together by HS2 for bill submission and will be published as far as possible
